description: This file defines a React functional component named ShortcutsOverlay that renders an overlay UI displaying keyboard shortcuts help. The component accepts props for handling close operations and toggling standalone mode.

methods.name: ShortcutsOverlay({ onClose, standalone = false })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a keyboard shortcuts overlay, with optional close button and styling based on 'standalone' prop.

ctags.name: ShortcutsOverlay
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ShortcutsOverlay({ onClose, standalone = false }) {$/
